Package com.clarkparsia.common.net

Class Summary
BasicX509TrustManager
HTTPS Initializes HTTPS with a less restrictive TrustManager
NetUtils Network, URI/URL, and IP related utility functions
NetworkInfo Try to determine MAC address of local network card; this is done using a shell to run ifconfig (linux) or ipconfig (windows).
StaticAuthenticator Implementation of the Authenticator interface which has a static username and password
VisualAuthenticator A GUI-based authenticator for obtaining user name and password information from the user for gaining access to protected URL's over HTTP.
 

Enum Summary
NetUtils.IPClass Enumeration representing the class of an IP
